question: Before April 1, 2025, will Perplexity announce that it is planning an IPO?
reasoning:
Based on the search results, there is no indication that Perplexity AI has announced plans for an IPO as of March 17, 2025. The articles and snippets retrieved suggest that Perplexity AI has not made any public announcements regarding an IPO, and there are no reports of such plans. Additionally, the company seems to be focusing on raising private investments and expanding its business model without going public.

Given the lack of evidence for an impending IPO announcement and the focus on private funding, the probability that Perplexity AI will announce an IPO before April 1, 2025, appears low.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.1

messages.content:
Based on the following question, analyze it carefully and provide your probability estimate.

Question: Before April 1, 2025, will Perplexity announce that it is planning an IPO?
Background: Observer: [A.I. Unicorns Have Good Reasons Not to Go Public](https://observer.com/2024/10/ai-unicorn-not-going-public/)
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Perplexity AI, Inc., announces before April 1, 2025, that it is planning an initial public offering. In order to streamline the resolution of this question, there are two resolution sources for the IPO announcement: 1) OpenAI filing an [SEC Form S-1](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/s/sec-form-s-1.asp) or 2) An announcement at the [News](https://www.perplexity.ai/hub) section of its website. If there is no such announcement before that date, this question resolves as **No**.
Fine print: 
present_date: 2025-03-17T19:44:28.157458


Make sure to use the tools at your disposal to gather relevant information before providing your final probability estimate.

You may reason through the problem, but you MUST end your response with:
FINAL PROBABILITY: [your decimal number between 0 and 1]
